com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.models
Class MD2Loader

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.models.MD2Loader

public class MD2Loader
extends java.lang.Object

Loads Quake 2 model files without normals. Use the resulting MD2Mesh with a MD2Instance for easier control over animation.

mzechner
